channel.title: Analytics on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Analytics on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: Copilot metrics is now generally available
item.description:
GitHub Copilot usage metrics are now generally available, providing a centralized view of team adoption and usage.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Pull request throughput and time to merge available in Copilot usage metrics API
item.description:
GitHub Copilot usage metrics APIs now include pull request outcomes metrics, enabling org-level reporting on PR throughput and time to merge.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure Cosmos DB Fleet Analytics
item.description:
Azure Cosmos DB Fleet Analytics is in public preview and provides centralized, large-scale insights across multiple Cosmos DB accounts, subscriptions, and workloads to help manage and analyze data across an organization’s entire Cosmos DB footprint.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server pg_duckdb extension
item.description:
Azure Database for PostgreSQL — Flexible Server now supports the pg_duckdb extension in public preview, allowing you to use DuckDB’s vectorized, columnar execution inside your PostgreSQL server to accelerate analytics workloads.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure Cosmos DB Mirroring in Microsoft Fabric
item.description:
Azure Cosmos DB Mirroring in Microsoft Fabric is now generally available, enabling customers to mirror operational Cosmos DB data into Fabric to run analytics and SQL queries without impacting production workloads.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Mirroring in Fabric for PostgreSQL Flexible Server
item.description:
Microsoft Fabric mirroring for Azure Database for PostgreSQL Flexible Server is now generally available. The feature lets you mirror PostgreSQL Flexible Server data into Microsoft Fabric (OneLake) to centralize data and simplify analytics, with support for network-isolated environments.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: SAP Business Data Cloud Connect to Azure Databricks
item.description:
SAP Business Data Cloud Connect to Azure Databricks is now generally available, providing secure, bi-directional, zero-copy data sharing between SAP BDC and Azure Databricks via Delta Sharing so teams can unify SAP and external data for analytics.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: github: Premium requests analytics page is now generally available
item.description:
GitHub launched a new Premium Requests analytics dashboard (generally available Sept 29, 2025) that offers comprehensive insights into premium request activity with data back to August 1, 2025.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Databricks One in Azure Databricks
item.description:
Databricks One is available in Azure Databricks as a public preview offering a unified, simplified platform that combines data engineering, analytics, and AI development into a single, governed environment with integrated collaboration and enterprise governance.

  • Source: Azure Updates
